title: WTB T206s with Tattoo-Transfer or Purple Number Back Stamps
author: Tripp Trapp

posts.post_title: WTB T206s with Tattoo-Transfer or Purple Number Back Stamps
posts.post_content: Hello, I’m interested in adding these stamp types to my collection of back stamps. I know these tattoo-transfers and purple numbers are somewhat tough to come by, but please let me know if you have any you’d be open to selling or trading. If interested I have several T206s to trade, some that have unique characteristics i.e. back stamps, missing color, wet sheet transfers, etc. Thanks!
